actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for certain repairs, improvements, or replacements of residential water wells.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a limited income tax deduction for uncompensated repairs to certain residential water wells damaged by drought.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for certain repairs, improvements, or replacements of residential water wells.
